short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide noisy sidebars, ads, promoted posts, and other distractions from LinkedIn. Just enjoy content from the people you follow.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple extension adds a one-click button to the menu bar in LinkedIn that instantly hides sidebars, ads, promoted posts and other extraneous items, so you can enjoy content from the people and companies you follow.

- Zero-configuration. Just click to quiet your feed.
- One click to bring everything back. Nothing is ever deleted.
- Safe, privateâ€”does not read your data or send anything to external servers.
- Multiple language support.
- No browser icon, no clutter.

LinkedIn is an amazing tool, but sometimes you want a little quiet and focus. That's all this does!

** Should be compatible with other LinkedIn extensions, but if you run into any issues please contact support at support@quiet.li. **
